name: RotoRope
description:
Controls: Only use mouse. Press and hold mouse click to use the rope. Roll the mouse around the ball to roll the rope (do not release button while doing this).  R to restart.

Your goal is to go to the doors to advance next level.

Theme: Rotation

Assets: Kenney's assets.

Game design & SFX & programming: ural89

Music: Parker Walker

RotoRope is a game for Kenney's Game Jam 2021.
